title: Restoring Privacy to ZEC on Solana via Encifher
contentSnippet: ZEC's price has surged by 380% this month.

title: Japan sees launch of its first yen-backed stablecoin, JPYC
contentSnippet: JPYC President Noriyoshi Okabe said that the stablecoin has already garnered interest from seven companies that are looking to incorporate it into their services.

title: WazirX Barred from Redistributing XRP as Indian Court Affirms Crypto as Property
contentSnippet: The ruling defines crypto as property with fiduciary protections, preventing WazirX from diluting user holdings after a $234 million hack.

title: Australian crypto firms back draft laws, but ‘critical questions’ remain
contentSnippet: Australia’s crypto exchanges have been largely positive about the government’s proposed crypto laws, but have told the Treasury that further clarity is needed.

title: Bitcoin finally escapes ‘fear’ as confidence tiptoes back into crypto
contentSnippet: The Crypto Fear & Greed Index has flipped to neutral, leaving “fear” behind for the first time since the mid-October market crash sparked by Trump’s China tariffs.

title: Japan's New Yen Stablecoin is Asia’s Only Truly Global Fiat-Pegged Token
contentSnippet: With the yen freely convertible and backed by Japan’s deep government bond market, JPYC’s launch stands apart from the region’s onshore-only experiments in Korea, Taiwan, and beyond.

title: Dogecoin Breaks Multi-Month Range as $0.21 Resistance Flips to Support
contentSnippet: DOGE outperforms broader crypto markets as volume climbs nearly 10% above weekly averages, signaling early accumulation within breakout structure.

title: XRP’s Clean Technical Break Repositions Bulls for $2.80 Push
contentSnippet: XRP surged 3% to $2.68 during Sunday’s session, breaking above the critical resistance level at $2.63 on a dramatic volume spike — one of the largest of the month.

title: Javier Milei’s crypto-friendly party wins Argentine midterm
contentSnippet: Argentina’s La Libertad Avanza party, led by President Javier Milei, has won the midterms, positioning Milei as the frontrunner for the 2027 elections.

title: ‘Attack on Bitcoin’ — Bitcoiners slam ‘legal threats’ in soft fork proposal
contentSnippet: A new Bitcoin improvement proposal calls for a one-year soft fork for Bitcoin while developers resolve the transaction filtering debate, but the language within it has sparked controversy.

title: Bitcoin Surpasses 50-Day Average, but CoinDesk BTC Trend Indicator Remains Bearish
contentSnippet: BTC looks north as Fed rate cut looms. But one key resistance is yet to be cleared.

title: Mt. Gox’s security flaws cost millions. Could AI have spotted them?
contentSnippet: Could AI have prevented the collapse of Mt. Gox had it been around then? Mt. Gox’s former CEO's AI-powered post-mortem raises an interesting “what if.”

title: Bitcoin Reclaims $115,000 as US–China Trade Hopes Lift Markets
contentSnippet: Bitcoin climbed over the weekend as signs of progress in U.S.–China trade talks lifted risk appetite across global markets.

title: Bitcoin Set for Massive Surge as Bank Reserves Near 'Danger Zone,' Says Adam Livingston
contentSnippet: The Kobeissi Letter reported bank cash at the Federal Reserve fell to about $2.93 trillion; Adam Livingston says that level signals a shift that would favor bitcoin.

title: Korean Public Company Bitplanet Kicks Off Treasury Plan, Buys Bitcoin as Market Rebounds
contentSnippet: Bitplanet, a publicly-listed firm backed by Metaplanet’s Simon Gerovich and Sora Ventures, has begun its daily Bitcoin purchases.

title: Major Iranian private bank goes bankrupt, roiling 42M customers
contentSnippet: After accumulating around $8 billion worth of losses and debt, Iran’s Ayandeh Bank has been dissolved, with customer assets absorbed by the state-owned Bank Melli.

title: Bitcoin is no inflation hedge but thrives when the dollar wobbles: NYDIG
contentSnippet: Bitcoin doesn’t consistently act as a hedge against inflation, but it has instead “evolved into a liquidity barometer,” says NYDIG’s Greg Cipolaro.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin Holds Above $114K as Whales Absorb Supply and Shorts Rebalance
contentSnippet: On-chain data shows roughly 62,000 BTC have moved out of long-term storage since mid-October, softening one of this cycle’s strongest tailwinds. But steady whale accumulation and a moderate short-side

title: Zcash pumps 30% after Arthur Hayes’ ‘vibe check’ tips $10K target
contentSnippet: Zcash rallied over 490% in the last 30 days and also crossed the $5 billion market capitalization threshold for the first time on Sunday.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds as $319M in Shorts Are Liquidated While Traders Eye U.S.-China Talks
contentSnippet: Bitcoin cleared $112,000 on heavy volume and hovered near $114,500 late Sunday (UTC), while CoinGlass showed $319 million of short positions liquidated over 24 hours.

title: Money giant Western Union to pilot stablecoin-powered transfers
contentSnippet: Western Union CEO said there are “significant opportunities” to utilize stablecoins for sending and receiving money across borders.

title: North Korea Has Stolen Billions in Crypto, But the Ability to 'Fight Back Is Growing': Chainalysis
contentSnippet: The sanctioning of the DPRK IT worker network and recovery of Bybit funds are signs of the growing pushback, experts told Decrypt.

title: 'Moments of the Unknown': Justin Aversano Shares Globetrotting Love Letter to Humanity
contentSnippet: From New York to Antarctica, Justin Aversano's latest work is a journey across continents, cultures, and the human heartbeat.

title: Alibaba’s Qwen Deep Research Creates Live Webpages, Podcasts in Seconds
contentSnippet: Alibaba's Qwen Deep Research now converts reports into live webpages and podcasts with one click. Here's how the free service compares to Gemini, ChatGPT, and Grok.

title: XRP Ledger Validator Sees NFT-to-NFT Trading Potential in Proposed 'Batch' Amendment
contentSnippet: The proposed Batch amendment for the XRP Ledger introduces atomic transaction capabilities.

title: Bitcoin Bid, XRP Retakes 200-Day Average as Fed Rate Cut Looms; 'Mag 7' Earnings, Trump-Xi Summit Eyed
contentSnippet: Major cryptocurrencies are trading higher ahead of a busy week featuring key Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan rate decisions alongside earnings reports from influential Mag 7 stocks.

title: Betting Scandals Are Rocking Sports. Will Prediction Markets Help or Hurt?
contentSnippet: Government regulators and legal experts warn that insider trading could proliferate in professional sports as wagers migrate to prediction markets.

title: AI Biodefense Startup Valthos Launches With $30 Million, OpenAI Backing
contentSnippet: New York-based startup Valthos is developing AI systems to identify and counter biological threats before they spread.

title: Meet the Roaring Kitty of Beyond Meat: 'I Would Feel Guilty Selling'
contentSnippet: Beyond Meat bull Dimitri "Capybara Stocks" Semenikhin helped pump the latest meme stock, but said he'll feel relieved once the chaos cools.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves $133 Million Worth of Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's space exploration firm, SpaceX, moved $133 million worth of Bitcoin on Friday after transferring funds earlier this week.
